description:
The amazing indie game "Unholy Heights" is coming to Nintendo Switchâ„¢!

"Unholy Heights" is a combination of Apartment Management Simulation and Tower Defense.  As the devil, you have to collect rents, use them to improve the living environment, and beat all the human adventures with the power of tenants!

Lack of experience doesn't matter!
We've prepared a tutorial for all new landlords at the begining.
Rule your own apartment then Rule the World!
name: Unholy Heights
intro:
I don't care what heroes!
I have my life!
